Title: The role of comorbidities and clinical predictors of severe disease in COVID-19: a systematic review and meta-analysis Emails
Study population: PubMed, Scopus, EMBASE, Web of Science, and Google Scholar searched through March 12 2027

Title: Association between rRT-PCR test results upon admission and outcome in hospitalized chest CT-Positive COVID-19 patients; a provincial retrospective cohort with active follow-up
Multivariate adjustment: Age, ICU admission, PCR test results, admission week, number of comorbidities, cardiovascular disease, chronic lung disease, diabetes, chronic kidney disease, gender, hypertension

Title: Preliminary Estimates of the Prevalence of Selected Underlying Health Conditions Among Patients with Coronavirus Disease 2019 — United States, February 12–March 28, 2020 [MMWR Morb Mortal Wkly Rep]
